paint

Class DrawMenuActions

  • java.lang.Object
    • paint.DrawMenuActions

  • public class DrawMenuActions
extends java.lang.Object
    It contains all of the action functions under the "Draw" menu

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DrawMenuActions() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void drawCircle()
      This function allows the user to draw a circle using two points.
      static void drawRectangle()
      This function allows the user to draw a rectangle using two points.
      static void drawSettings()
      Retrieves information from slider, fill button, size slider and updates the canvasGraphicsContext with those properties
      static void drawSquare()
      This function allows the user to draw a square using two points.
      static void drawTriangle()
      This function allows the user to draw a Triangle using two points.
      static void editFreeHandAction()
      This function allows the user to draw freely on the canvas.
      static void editTwoPointLine()
      This function allows the user to draw a line using two points.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • drawSettings

        public static void drawSettings()
        Retrieves information from slider, fill button, size slider and updates the canvasGraphicsContext with those properties

      • editFreeHandAction

        public static void editFreeHandAction()
        This function allows the user to draw freely on the canvas.

      • editTwoPointLine

        public static void editTwoPointLine()
        This function allows the user to draw a line using two points. Press mouse button and keep pressing, drag to the second point, release button.

      • drawRectangle

        public static void drawRectangle()
        This function allows the user to draw a rectangle using two points. Press mouse button and keep pressing, drag to the second point, release button.

      • drawSquare

        public static void drawSquare()
        This function allows the user to draw a square using two points. Press mouse button and keep pressing, drag to the second point, release button.

      • drawCircle

        public static void drawCircle()
        This function allows the user to draw a circle using two points. Press mouse button and keep pressing, drag to the second point, release button.

      • drawTriangle

        public static void drawTriangle()
        This function allows the user to draw a Triangle using two points. Press mouse button and keep pressing, drag to the second point, release button.
